title: For Sale:  IWI Tavor- Barely fired (~200 RDS). Comes with Aipoint Pro ($200 extra), Manticore Arms Rail, Muzzle Device, Magpul foregrip, pressure activated light, 8 mags and all original furniture/items.
location: West Side- Cottonwood Mall area, Albuquerque, New Mexico
postcontent:
Hi All,

It is with great regret I am having to part ways with my favorite rifle- my Israel Weapons Industry Tavor. This is literally the perfect rifle and I am incredibly sad to be selling it. The rifle has been my baby and it has been treated as such. Unfortunately, I went and had an actual baby which I have learned I am not allowed to sell without being visited by unwanted guests. 

All Joking aside (Please don't send me weird messages) my Tavor is in near perfect condition having only had about 200 rounds through it. I never even got a chance to stretch out her legs. I added and am including a Manticore Arms top rail to it which alone is $105, a cheap Amazon muzzle device, a UTG pressure activated light (works extremely well- never will understand why people drop hundreds on Streamlights), 8 brand new magazines, a Magpul foregrip and all of the items that came with the rifle from the factory minus the box (cleaning kit, IWI magazine, original top rail, original A2 muzzle device, sight tool, owner's manual etc.). I am also throwing in a near new Aimpoint Pro ($400 retail) for an additional $200. 

I won't get into the general specifics of Tavor rifles as anyone serious about buying knows the pedigree this top of the line rifle- there's a reason it is the main battle rifle of the IDF. I am the original owner of the rifle and it is 100% clean. I'm not trying to BS anyone or be BS'd and I would appreciate having serious inquiries only. I am not interested in payments or trades so please have the required cash available. I'd be more than happy to provide more info or pics to anyone seriously interested in purchasing my baby- as in my Tavor (again, no actual babies are for sale- I really really wish I didn't have to specify that but: internet.). 

If you are serious and would like to see, or even fire, the rifle we can meet at a Calibers so we are in a safe and neutral place and you have the option of putting rounds through the Tavor before you spend your hard earned money. I have absolutely nothing to hide and am only interested in an honest transaction. 

Thank you for taking the time to read and I hope to hear from all serious  potential buyers.

This is one awesome press, and I have all of the ancillary equipment that you'll need to get started. You don't even need to buy any powder, brass, or bullets to start cranking out some rounds.

It comes with EVERYTHING that you need to get started reloading .223/5.56. I have a Zip trim case trimmer, trimmer tool, scale, chamfer tools (x2), all of the dies, and much more. This comes with a bunch of brass, 200 FMJ bullets, a new bottle of powder, LEE crimp dies, the double disk kit, and a bullet extractor. It's a shame that I didn't get to use it, but since I have to part ways with my AR, I won't have a need for all of this equipment.

Check my other listings for a Ruger SR556 for sale, as well as 1000 rounds of M855 ammo.

My loss is your gain! I'm selling all of this for what you could buy just the press for.

title: For Sale:  Winchester 1897 Black Diamond Trap Gun 2 Barrel Set for sale!
postcontent:
I've got an old Winchester Model 1897 Black Diamond take-down trap gun in 12ga with 2 barrels for sale. 

The gun functions flawlessly; if I remember correctly, the serial dated the gun to around 1903. The receiver and BOTH barrels are all matching. One barrel is modified choke and the other is full choke. 

The pump foregrips are original, but unfortunately the stock has been replaced by a previous owner. It also has a pachmayr buttpad installed, which makes it much more enjoyable to shoot. 

If you're not familiar, this is one of the few shotguns that can "slam-fire" by holding down the trigger. This makes it extremely fast at competitions and has been used in both WWI and WWII to great effect. 

Asking $400, and that's it!

West Coast Armory in Bellevue is having a special this month: NO TRANSFER FEES! Get it while you can and save yourself the transfer fee!

title: For Sale:  Blaser R93 3 barrels
postcontent: This rifle is an estate item and appears to be unfired since purchase. This top of the line take-down rifle comes with 3 different barrels, (1-270 Winchester, 2-300 Winchester magnum and 3-416 Remington magnum). With this setup you are covered for anything from long range light skinned game all the way to heavy African hunting. The first 2 barrel each have their own 3-12 x 50 D Swarovski scopes with Ballistic turret attachment. The 416 barrel has iron sights and a muzzle break. There are 2 complete bolts, one for the 270 and one for the magnums. The 416 barrel also has it's own forearm for the heaver barrel contour. The stock has a “kick-stop” recoil reducer. The Blaser R93 Luxus is a top of the line straight pull bolt action hunting rifle from Germany. The locking system of the R93 bolts in a straight line without rotational movement in the barrel. When repeating, the body movement is minimized. The process is faster than with conventional actions, allowing more time to aim and re-aim for subsequent shots. This is a particular advantage on drive and big game hunts. The safety system is also very advanced in that the firing pin is not cocked when on safe. Immediately prior to firing a shot, the firing pin spring is cocked by pushing the safety slide forward. This movement is virtually silent and will not alert game to your presence. If no shot is fired, simply return the safety slide to its original position for maximum safety. An FFL is required for shipment.

title: For Sale:  antique Iver Johnson 5 shot revolver in .32 SW (with ammo)
postcontent:
antique Iver Johnson  5 shot revolver in .32 SW short

This seems to be the same model that was used by Leon Czolgosz to shoot President William McKinley with in 1901. The gun is in nicer shape then the pictures show.  It also still shoots very well. This comes with a bag of 50 .32 S&W Short bullets appropriate for this gun.

The Iver Johnson Arms & Cycle Works (yes, makers of handguns and fine bicycles), was started back in 1871 by a 30-year old Norwegian born inventor of the same name. Truth be told, it started as the Johnson and Bye Company, but eventually Johnson bought out Bye and went at it alone. The Fitchburg, Massachusetts based factory concentrated more on its bicycles than its firearms and employed many Scandinavian immigrants.
Just before Iver died in 1895, his company began to produce a new revolver that the late engineer had perfected late in life known as the Safety Automatic.

Design of the Safety Automatic

The Iver Johnson Safety Automatic neither has a manual safety, nor is it automatic. It’s a revolver. Its a double-action top break revolver similar in layout to the Smith and Wesson hinge frames of the 1860s era. What made the Iver different from the Smiths was in the fact that it had an internal transfer bar safety. This safety consisted of a bar that rested between the hammer and the rear of the cartridge in the cylinder/chamber. The bar prevented the gun from discharging if dropped and only fell away when the trigger was depressed all the way.

Box and Adds are NOT included

No shipping. Face to Face only NH Residents only.
Meet in person in parking lot of gun store in Merrimack NH. Must have NH driver license and NH Carry permit to verify you are not a felon. OR we will do a FFL transfer and We will split the $20 fee.

postcontent:
Free Shipping!

www.tracecreekoutfitters.com

VG6 Gamma and CAGE devices also available.

The VG6 EPSILON 556 is the pinnacle of AR15 muzzle devices. The EPSILON 556 just outperforms everything on the market. Designed for the discriminating shooter and professional end-users, VG6 Precision's EPSILON 556 affords you the best muzzle control and recoil mitigation the industry has to offer. This is a true combination muzzle brake / compensator / flash hider. Its performance is matched only by the amazing look of this device.
The VG6 Epsilon556 carries many of the same characteristics as the Gamma556 with a few exceptions. Extended flash hiding prongs and no ports at the 12 o’clock positions allow uninhibited view from flash through optics or sights. The difference in porting is also noticed on the underside of the device where it has 6 valve holes to allow the fastest gasses reaching the second chamber to exit. This creates very soft low energy recoil that allows for absolute control. The VG6 Epsilon556 carries all these specs and is priced well below our competitors.
